text.__SUMMARY__: Odetta dekleini is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The shell size varies between 1.1 mm and 1.3 mm
text.Distribution: This species occurs in the Atlantic Ocean off the Cape Verde Islands and São Tomé and Principe.
